posts.cooked:
we are trying to update yagsl to the latest version and we get this weird movements

the swerve had worked with the last version and we are running the latest version of the example code with our json from the beta and changing the default command to driveFieldOrientedAngularVelocity other than that it is just the example code with no change

I donâ€™t think its a pid problem as the pid had worked for us before and also in AScope the movement look like the module is doing full and half rotations and irl it is not what is happening

Google Drive file.

Google Drive file.
Are you in shop rn? We can chat on the discord for an hour if you want to try to fix this
that would be greate i will join the yagsl dis
Glad we fixed the issue! I wonder if the absolute encoder direction changed between the beta and now.
The problem was that my student accidently put an old version of the json

posts.name: Lucas
